intro: Lalage ornata, commonly known as the ornate lalage, is a flowering plant native to the island of Madagascar. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, fragrant white flowers that bloom in clusters. Its leaves are opposite, simple, and often covered in fine hairs. Lalage ornata is typically found in humid, shaded environments within the rainforest.
